description: Christmas is over and a new year has begun. Prague looks grey in these winter days and I tried my luck in the metro this time. I must always take care that it isn´t too overcrowded there because most boys are too shy when they feel that someone nearby could hear our little conversation. Anyway, to make it short: I was successful. A nice young student with a promising body. He was easy and friendly. He showed me his dick and I liked what I saw.So I took him to an hour-hotel in these cold days. But what I didn´t like is that he tried to steal my wallet. When I realized that I decided to teach him a lesson.
title: Czech Hunter 70
